api_list.api_description: Retrieve information about specific 'thing' items such as board games.

required_parameters.name: ids
required_parameters.description: Comma-separated list of thing IDs to retrieve.

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: Filter results by THINGTYPEs like boardgame, expansion, accessory etc.

api_list.api_description: Retrieve an array of popular memes that may be captioned.

query: I'm interested in learning more about specific board games by their IDs and I would like to see popular memes to caption. Can you provide this information?
